pages.title: 感應精煉爐
pages.text: The Induction Smelter is a machine that smelts multiple items together, producing alloys. It can also smelt ores into ingots and gems, which is affected by $(l:thermal:world/materials/catalysts)catalysts$(/l). Smelting ores has a chance to produce rich slag as a secondary output, which can be used as a catalyst or to make $(l:thermal:world/plants/phytogro)phyto-gro$(/l). Smelting gravel yields flint and slag.
